item.title: Filmi funda
item.description: Some news from the Kolloywood. Check out the latest pictures of Kamal Hassan in Dasa here. In other news, Vijaykanth is infurious.. Vijayakanth: Naan Jaya TV mela Case podanum..! Police : Yedhuku Captian? VK : Naan Katchi arambichathai “Vilaiyaattu Seithiyila pottu irukiraanga” End of the world nearing, doomsayer cry… _First world war 1914 ——- DEATH: 10000 __Second World war 1943 —- DEATH: 150000 _Ajith’s ALWAR 2006 —– Apocalypse … end of the world
